ygData.subject: RE: Gimmee Gimmee!
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks Harmonic.  You know, it really wasn t THAT bad.  I just pushed through it by logging on every night and killing Bouncers with the same group in Oggok.
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks Harmonic. You know, it really wasn't THAT bad. I just pushed
through it by logging on every night and killing Bouncers with the same
group in Oggok. Yes it was boring but I did get through 45th in about 9
evenings or so. The last half bubble was the Frenzy camp in Lower Guk which
is a pretty good place for experience as well (but hard to get into). After
hitting 46th it only took me about an hour to be over half a bubble in. Ha.
My guild had almost completely cleared Fear that night so with only a half
bubble into 46th I got to go see that. I felt like a kid again with most
things conning red and me kinda cowering behind the others singing. But
with a half bub in 46 and only one cleric in the zone you don't let an Amy
hit you more than once or twice before backing off. :-)

[46 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work

> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
> >
> > [46 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work
> >
>
> ^^^^^^^^^ nice work. That last hell level was a bitch huh?
>
> Congrats,
>
> Harmonic.
